reuters.title: VARITY EXPECTS TO REPORT 4TH QTR AND FULL-YEAR 1986 LOSS
reuters.body:
Iomega Corp said its president, Gabriel Fusco, resigned as president to become chairman and chief executive officer of <Sequoia Systems>. Fusco was president and chief executive officer of Iomega between April 1983 and January 1987, and will remain on the company's board of directors.
